title: Audit interview feedback & report via Slack with GPT-4o-mini and Google Sheets
description:
## Description
This workflow automates the evaluation of interviewer feedback using AI. It retrieves raw notes from Google Sheets, processes them through GPT-4o-mini for structured scoring, validates outputs, and calculates weighted quality scores. The system provides real-time Slack feedback to interviewers, logs AI errors for transparency, and recommends training if the feedback quality is low.
## What This Template Does (Step-by-Step)
- ‚ö° Manual Trigger ‚Äì Runs the workflow manually to start evaluation.
-  üìã Fetch Raw Feedback Data (Google Sheets) ‚Äì Reads all feedback entries (Role, Stage, Interviewer Email, Feedback Text, row_number).
-  üß† AI Quality Evaluator (Azure GPT-4o-mini) ‚Äì Processes feedback into structured JSON across 5 dimensions.
-  üîç Analyze Feedback Quality (LLM Chain) ‚Äì Applies scoring rules (Specificity, STAR, Bias-Free, Actionability, Depth) and outputs structured JSON.
-  ‚úÖ Validate AI Response ‚Äì Ensures AI output isn‚Äôt undefined or malformed.
-  üö® Log AI Errors (Google Sheets) ‚Äì Records invalid AI responses for debugging and auditing.
-  üîÑ Parse AI JSON Output (Code Node) ‚Äì Converts AI JSON text into structured n8n objects with error handling.
-  üßÆ Calculate Weighted Quality Score (Code Node) ‚Äì Computes final weighted score (0‚Äì100), generates flags, formats vague phrases, and preserves context.
-  üíæ Save Scores to Spreadsheet (Google Sheets) ‚Äì Updates the original feedback row with Score, Flags, and AI JSON.
-  üí¨ Send Feedback Summary to Interviewer (Slack) ‚Äì Sends interviewers a structured Slack report (score, flags, vague phrases, STAR improvement tips).
-  üéØ Check if Training Needed ‚Äì Applies threshold logic: if score < 50, route to training recommendations.
-  üìö Send Training Recommendations (Slack) ‚Äì Delivers STAR method guides and bias-free interviewing resources to low scorers.

## Prerequisites
- Google Sheets (Raw_Feedback + Error Log Sheet)
- Azure OpenAI API credentials (for GPT-4o-mini)
- Slack API credentials (for sending feedback & training notifications)
- n8n instance (cloud or self-hosted)

## Key Benefits
 ‚úÖ Automated interview feedback quality scoring
 ‚úÖ Bias detection and vague feedback flagging
 ‚úÖ Real-time Slack feedback to interviewers
 ‚úÖ Error logging for AI reliability tracking
 ‚úÖ Training recommendations for low scorers
 ‚úÖ Audit trail maintained in Google Sheets

## Perfect For
- HR & Recruitment teams ensuring structured interviewer feedback
- Organizations enforcing STAR method & bias-free hiring
- Teams seeking continuous interviewer coaching
- Companies needing audit-ready records of interview quality
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.
